Zandile Zakuza, onye makwaara dị ka Zanda Zakuza bụ onye South Africa na onye na-agụ egwu kwaito ma bụrụkwa onye na-ede egwu
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Umlazi, ọ nwetara ọmụma  mgbe ọ gosipụtara na egwu "Skeleton Move" nke Master KG na "Club Controller" (2019) nke Prince Kaybee.
A mụrụ Zakuza ma zụlite ya na Durban, KwaZulu-Natal mana ezinụlọ ya bu ndị Bizana na Eastern Cape.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị nke Pinetown ma mesịa banye na Mahadum nke KwaZulu-Natal, ebe ọ gụrụ mmụta gbasara egwu, nke nlekwasị anya na jazz
Zanda hapụrụ n'afọ nke abụọ ya iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu; Otú ọ dị, o mechara laghachi na kọleji iji mụọ njikwa azụmahịa na human resources.
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ na-ahọrọ ịgba egwú na egwuregwu karịa ma mesịa tinye uche na egwu mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'oge ihe omume ngosi ọ na-eme, ndị mmadụ nọ na ihe omume ahụ na-ehisi anya mmiri n'ihi ụdị  obi ọ na-eji eme ihe mgbe niile.

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mahadum, o mere ka o doo anya na ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge na-enweghị ọrụ ma tupu ya enwee ihe ịga nke ọma na egwu.
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2015 wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Open Mic Productions
N'abalị́ iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, ọ wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya Synthia The Journey,
Abọm ahụ na-akọwa ndụ nne ya na nkwado ọrụ egwu ya
Abọm ahụ gụnyere Mgbakwunye sitere na Bongo Beats, Spirit Banger, Dr Moruti na Doc Shebeleza
N'abalị́ atọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2020, e wepụtara egwu ya bụ "Khaya Lam" nke gosipụtara Master KG na Prince Benza.

N'abalị́ iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2021,e wepụtara egwu ya  bụ"Afrika" nke gosipụtara Mr Six21 DJ, Bravo De Virus na Fallo SA. Ọ natara nhọpụta maka Best Female Artist na South Africa na All Africa Music Awards
